Charlotte Brannigan

  1. Foster Name: Charlotte Sturm
  2. Foster Family: Andrew Sturm
  3. Location of Family: Nehawka, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Weeping Water, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 14
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Weeping Water Republican, 9 June 1898; Find-A-Grave for Charlotte S. Sturm.
